Description:
In front of you, there is a mine that looks on the verge of collapsing. Lizardmen, crocomen, and nagas alike are forced to work there, oblivious to the danger they are exposed to.

Some guards watch over the miners, hitting them when they stop digging. It looks like they are searching for a precious and rare magical stone, the same one that the natives of Aquarfall love so much and is so ubiquitous in their culture.

As the sentinels are distracted by hitting the slaves, it would be quite easy for you to continue your journey and ignore this place, but those poor cold-blooded races don’t deserve this, and you know it.
DescriptionAction: What will you do in this situation?

    "SSRewardText": "You charge at the guards, forcing them into a defensive stance as they try to fend off your attacks. \r\n\nWhen the prisoners realize you’re helping them, they quickly flee the mines. One of the smaller lizardmen tosses you a bag, urging you to take whatever you need from it. He also hands you a humble-looking key, asking you to deliver it to his parents in the slums.\r\n\nThere's no time to speak with him, as the little lizardman escapes while the battle with the guards intensifies. But you’re determined to check the bag once the guards are dealt with!",

    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "You rush into the caverns, cheering on the slaves and motivating them to keep digging. The guards are initially confused but allow you to continue, as your techniques seem to be effective.\r\n\nAfter a period of exhausting digging, the slaves are too worn out to continue and must stop. Although they don’t uncover anything significant, they manage to fulfill their quota ahead of schedule.\r\n\nAs a token of gratitude for introducing new ways to motivate the slaves, the guards share some shards with your group!",
    "SSRewardTier": "",
    "SSRoll": true,
    "SSRollCard": "None",
    "SSRollMode": "LowerOrEqual",

    "SSCRewardText": "You rush into the caverns, cheering on the slaves and motivating them to keep digging. The guards are initially confused but allow you to continue, as your techniques seem to be effective.\r\n\nAfter a period of exhausting digging, the slaves are too worn out to continue and must stop. Although they don’t uncover anything significant, they manage to fulfill their quota ahead of schedule.\r\n\nAs a token of gratitude for introducing new ways to motivate the slaves, the guards share some shards with your group!",

    "FLRewardText": "You rush into the caverns, cheering on the slaves and motivating them to keep digging. However, the guards intervene to stop you before your words can have any impact on the slaves’ work.\r\n\nYou attempt to convince the guards that you are only trying to help, but they respond that if you’re so eager, you should grab a pickaxe and dig alongside the slaves.\r\n\nYou decline their offer, and hostilities ensue.",

    "SSRewardText": "The guards look at you, confused, but Nenukil speaks with such authority that they are unable to argue with him.\r\n\nThe dwarf points to a wooden beam that is about to break and tells the guards they’d better take everyone out before it collapses. The guards quickly realize that disaster is just moments away and begin evacuating the mine.\r\n\nWith the mines empty, you are able to “save” some shards stored in a nearby pile.
